inn1.comm: length ball outside off, Sehwag watches it go past the stumps
Dilshan saves a boundary at backward point, diving to his left. it is hit powerfully by Sehwag with an open face
this time Sehwag places it better, goes into it early and makes sure it is hit away from Dilshan. Poor start for Kula, short and wide
gets away with this short delivery, this is cut one-bounce to Dilshan
plays and misses outside off, this is fuller, and has Sehwag reaching for it
hint of away movement here as Sehwag reaches out for another delivery well outside off. The fuller lengths have been better for Kula
Dilshan has saved two more. Tendulkar gets off to a good start, leaning back and cutting Wele, but Dilshan again dives full length and gets a hand to it
on the pads, Tendulkar misses out on the offering
reaches out for a full and wide delivery, makes good contact but plays it back to the bowler
pulls the length back, angles it across, Tendulkar punches off the back foot, to cover
puts in more effort in this one, gets it to rise a touch more, Tendulkar stands tall and pushes it into the covers
sharp delivery, on the pads, Tendulkar misses, but the lbw shout is optimistic as it is pitched outside leg
Kula stays outside off, Sehwag doesn't go for it this time
and he lets another one go outside off, this one comes in but not enough
Kula gets fuller, it's a half-volley, and Sehwag has no second thoughts going for a drive through extra cover. Elegant shot
goes for the square drive this time, but the ball doesn't quite come on. Gets an inside edge onto his pad
good good call by the umpire, this one looks like a pretty plumb shout for lbw. The ball jags back in, Sehwag is caught in the crease and is hit in front, but just manages a faint inside edge
charges down the track this time, and fails to make contact with a short-of-a-length delivery
on target, pretty quick, Tendulkar defends in front of his front pad
leans forward and drives a back-of-a-length delivery, to cover
cuts this time time, but it too close to the stumps
full, almost a yorker, dug out without trouble
looks to turn it away off the pads, but is early into the shot

good shot, goooood shot, he has merely met the ball, not even pushed at it, just makes a half movement onto the front foot, and gives a back-of-a-length delivery a slightly slanted face, it races through extra cover
back of a length, and played back to the bowler
and Dilshan saves three more, hit powerfully, with an open face, but Dilshan dives to his left again, at point and gets a hand to it
fullish ball, gets onto the front foot and defends it into the covers
back of a length, the inward movement tucks him up, and he plays it towards mid-on
draws a false shot from Tendulkar, who drives away from his body, the ball dips in, gets the inside edge, misses the stumps, the keeper and the fine leg
a much more convincing straight drive this time, but Kula gets a hand to it
back of a length, on the stumps, and defended back to the bowler
a hint of swing, Wele will hope it weren't there as it converts it into a length ball on the pads and Sehwag flicks it over square leg. Easy as they come
looks to tuck him up with a shorter delivery, succeeds in it, and gets a dot ball
a better short delivery, right over the middle stump, Sehwag sways out of the way, keeps his eyes on it all along, impresses Sunny Gavaskar with the leave
the flick-pull, uff what a shot, one foot in air, standing on the toes of the other, he just helps it off his hips, and what an outfield, races past midwicket. It was merely a push
follows it up with a full-blooded cut, short and not so wide, but he makes room and goes over cover-point
length delivery, outside off, Tendulkar reaches for it, and plays with an open face towards point
this one is closer to Tendulkar's body, he drives, but finds the cover fielder
if the drive doesn't, the push will. This is shorter, and Tendulkar stands his ground and just meets it with an open face. The timing is good, the placement exquisite, between cover and cover-point
the square push again, the late wrist cock gets him power, but Dilshan is alert at point
pushes off the back foot and scampers through for one to mid-on
the inward movement keeps Sehwag quiet here. The backlift is big, he is looking for the cut, but the ball jags back in and gives him no room
it's through Jayasuriya at mid-off, Tendulkar just pushed it towards mid-off, and timed it really well, but Jaya was fully behind the ball and got a bad bounce at the last moment
drives it off the back foot, wide of mid-off, gets an easy single
Sehwag is looking to manufacture shots now, makes room, takes it from over the stumps and cuts it towards Dilshan at point

this short ball gets big on Sehwag, he looks for the flick-pull again, but sees it has bounced more than he though, and goes for the traditional pull and gets a top edge over square leg in circle and square of fine leg
fuller delivery on the pads, and he helps it around the corner for one
a yorker now, and Tendulkar digs it out safely. This is the second yorker Welegedara has bowled in his first spell

Sehwag is looking dangerous here, a perfectly acceptable delivery, short and over the stumps, but Sehwag makes room and plays it off the front foot, over cover. Not many outside Sehwag can play this shot
drives solidly, but straight to mid-on
goes over extra, shot of the morning, looks so pretty too, length ball outside off, within his arc and he lofts it without much power over and inside out
slower ball, low fulltoss, misses out and plays it straight to midwicket

amazing shot again, short delivery, stops at him, he is too early into the shot, but he stays on the front foot and pulls this one over midwicket and it carries over the boundary. Big laughs both Sehwag and Tendulkar share
flicked away powerfully, but can't go wide enough of mid-on
another ball stopping at the batsman, Tendulkar goes for the flick shot of the pads but is early into the shot and is beaten
walks across the stumps, and flicks it off the back foot, gets Sehwag on strike
length ball, just outside off, stands tall and pushes it to cover
another pull, another boundary, they are sitting up nicely for Sehwag, not much pace in the pitch, and bouncers in the early 130s are not troubling Sehwag at all
stands tall and pushes this off the back foot towards midwicket, it beats the short midwicket and they get an easy couple

Sehwag you beauty, he has played almost two shots to this slower ball, it's floated wide at 116.8,ks, he gets into the position and waits for the ball to arrive. When it does arrive, he drives it over extra, reaches 50 also
gets an inside edge first ball, this is the second time Tendulkar has got away with one, gets a single to fine leg
another superb shot although it's just two, this is a short ball outside two, he gets across and plays his flick-pull through midwicket, all along the ground
another short ball, over the top of off stump this time, and he defends it to cover
length ball outside off, Sehwag drives it down to mid-off
misses out on a leg-stump half-volley, gets a leg-bye though. Extra pace from Fernando keeping Sehwag in check so far
this is the slower knuckle ball, Tendulkar flicks it from in front of stumps and gets a single
Tendulkar charges down and chips it over extra cover, gets an easy couple, but Angelo Mathews's flat throw from sweeper-cover gets Welegedara in the face. It just bounces off the square
comes back with a yorker, Tendulkar digs it out
back of a length, outside off, Tendulkar pushes it powerfully, straight to mid-off
good bouncer, over the stop of stumps and it stays a touch low, some effort Tendulkar has to put in to duck underneath
another yorker, swinging late also, but Tendulkar not only digs it out but gets a couple to midwicket
and lofts the next ball straight past the bowler. No room for error here, it's a length ball, not too wide, but Tendulkar gets a nice clean swing of the bat in
another delivery on the pads, Sehwag flicks it but they have protection in the deep now
beautiful shot, from the old Tendulkar school, slightly back of a length, he hits it on the up, deliberately in the air, and clears mid-on with ease, one bounce into the long-on fence
late inswing here, Tendulkar will think he has missed out on a leg-stump half-volley
plays with an open face this time, can't beat Dilshan at point
short ball, gets good bounce here, Tendulkar goes on his toes and plays it towards point
good quick yorker, 146ks, he digs it out and goes for a quick single to cover and makes it easily
they pinch in a quick single here, played back to Wele, who fumbles a little and they run through
early into the flick, gets a leading edge, which goes all along the ground, and down the ground, for a single to mid-off
Tendulkar looks for a quick single but has played it too firmly to cover
what a shot, this yorker has gone wrong by merely inches, Tendulkar opens up, his front leg is cleared away and he flicks it through midwicket, all placement and quick outfield
pushes it off the back foot towards mid-off, soft hands and he rushes through for one
back of a length, on the stumps, and Sehwag defends towards cover
goes for the yorker again, but it is a fulltoss outside off, Tendulkar drives but can't beat cover
another delivery in the block hole, and he half-digs-half-flicks it, wide of midwicket and gets a couple
Tendulkar is putting up an exhibition, he is ducking under a bouncer, at the mast moment he thinks it is boring to duck and upper-cuts it, and it flies, feet wide of third man but beats him
tries the same shot, but this is sharper, quicker and higher and beats Tendulkar, 146ks
ho ho ho, easy come easy go, another bouncer tries Fernando, and Tendulkar sways slightly out of the line and upper-cuts it, fine, almost over the keeper, gets to 50 with that shot
goes full now, and is driven to cover

Powerplay, what Powerplay? First ball without restrictions, it's a nice length ball and military-medium pace, Sehwag clears the front leg, makes room and goes over wide mid-off, one bounce into the boundary
short and wide, and cut away to square of third man
Sehwag has absolutely hared across for a single, Tendulkar gets an inside edge looking to flick one, and Sehwag rushes through for one

Sehwag has got zilch respect for the medium-pace of Mathews, there is a long-off in place and he can't do much more than you and I. Another length ball, Sehwag clears the front leg and lofts it straight. Powerful, cruel, rude
slower bouncer this time, Sehwag shapes to pull but, er, pulls out

Sehwag is no fire, crowds need more cover. Another length delivery, again Sehwag clears his front leg, and goes square this time, for the biggest six of the over, into the shamianas, the tents. Surely they can't be strong enough, the shamianas?
bowls over the wicket, fires down the leg side
another delivery outside leg, but it makes contact with Sachin's pad as he is sweeping
stays on the pads, Sehwag makes room and gets a single to cover

there is a competition contest going on here, and each player is coming up with one better than the other. This time Tendulkar dances down the track, makes room, and goes dead straight. What a clean hit
makes room again, Jaya goes flat, Tendulkar opens the face and gets a single to sweeper-cover
on the pads, works it into the leg side for one
sweeps from in front of stumps, gets a single
they are toying with the bowlers here, length ball from outside off, and he drags it across towards mid-on, straighter of the fielder, and another boundary results. Oh well
and now drives it down to mid-off
yorker outside off, and he digs it out with an open face and gets a single
helped away off the hips for a single
almost a yorker, and he plays it to long-on for one
slower ball, 130ks, and he gets a single down to long-on
big shout for lbw as Sehwag looks for the reverse sweep, and the inside edge saves him
worked away off the pads for a single
brings out the sweep this time, Fernando fumbles at deep backward square but they don't risk the second
Sehwag makes room, Jaya fires it in, but then gets too cheeky and looks to catch Sachin backing up. Misses the stumps and they come through for one
sweeps fine, gets a single to wide of short fine
reverse-sweeps again, makes good contact this time and gets four. Remarkable shot given it almost got him lbw earlier in the over
low fulltoss outside off, played with open face towards point
stays full and wide, Tendulkar drives, but straight to cover

bowled him, Tendulkar has been bowled through the gate. Looks to run to third man a back-of-a-length delivery, but it jags back enough to beat the bat and take the top of off. Well bowled Dilhara, follows up two attempts at yorkers with a nice fast delivery short of length and cutting in
and what a wild delivery, high fulltoss, wide down the leg side, gets a beamer warning, goes for five wides, and Brad Hogg on air says, he needs a GPS system
he does need GPS, a bouncer too high now
pushes off the back foot, but weight is forward and rushes for a single, wide of mid-off
Sehwag swipes, ugly shot, ugly result, inside edge onto the pads, but Dhoni is alert enough to call him through for one
lovely yorker, swinging in late, Dhoni can't do much with it
goes for the Tendulkar vertical-sweep, but it's too wide down the leg side
reverse-sweep this time, gets a single to the right of point
back of a length, pushed down the ground for one
Sehwag dances down the track, too early, Jaya sees it and slows it down, but Sehwag keeps his wits and drives down the ground
flat delivery outside off, pushes it to cover
fuller delivery, but again driven to cover
gets on to the front foot and works this from in front of stumps into the leg side
slower low fulltoss, and Dhoni charges through for a single after hitting it straight to mid-on. He is swift between the wickets
back of a length, on the pads, helped away for a single to square leg
half-volley outside off, Dhoni gets power behind it but can't beat mid-off
back of a length outside off, Dhoni shoulders arms
flicks it off the pads to wide of mid-on, gets a single
tucks him up with a short ball, Sehwag stands tall and defends
it's signalled leg-bye, Dhoni is bemused. Not sure whether he thought he hit it or was it wide down the leg. Replays show it was a wide, no contact of Dhoni's person on it
pulled away, deep midwicket in place
works it away off the pads
steps out, is yorked, and plays it back to the bowler. Feeling edgy here?
no edginess in that shot, short, asking to be hit, and he has launched it into the stands behind mdiwicket. No dull moment with Sehwag around
makes room, Jaya fires it in, he opens the face and gets a single to point
almost a wicket first ball, Sehwag looks to keep the pull down, instead of going up and over, and the ball lands just short of Samaraweera at midwicket
walks down the pitch, and works him for a single to cover
goes for the bouncer, Sehwag ducks and it's too high a bouncer
phew, what a shot, he has not seen the slower bouncer, has to give up the flick-pull, and wait for it to arrive, and then he goes past short fine leg, what placement
that's it, what a century, looks to drive a fulltoss outside off, gets a thick edge to the third-man boundary. they are delighted in the dressing room
full, outside off, and played to cover
another slower short ball, and he has pulled it to deep square for single
another wide down the leg side
time for Dhoni to join in the fun now, steps down the track, and lofts it out of the ground. Hogg thinks we need a taxi to get the ball back
take Dhoni's helicopter shot, but invert it to behind the wicket and you have what he just did to a ball outside leg from Jaya. What a boundary to the right of the keeper
over the wicket to Dhoni too, and he drives this down the ground for single
another delivery on the pads, and he takes an easy single to long-on
it almost took a finger off Jayasuriya's hand. Hit straight at him, fast and furious, pummelled really, Jaya looks to go for the catch but good job he doesn't make any contact
nice flat delivery to start off with, no turn, Sehwag turns it around the corner for a single
Dhoni dances down the track again, and gets a single down to long-on
gets too straight, and flicked away to midwicket
short and flat and cut away to sweeper-cover
that's a wide down the leg side, not helping SL these extras
short and Sehwag waits for it and pushes it down the ground
another single down the ground
round the wicket, flat across Dhoni, who cuts it to point for one
Sehwag goes for the big heave over extra and misses
goes over extra, and gets just enough elevation, clears his front leg again and times it superbly
drags it from outside off and gets a single down to long-on

oh what a shot, what bottom hand, not much backlift when he looks to pull this, but the final contact with the ball features a sudden jab and imparts all the power. The placement is perfect too: between long-on and midwicket
cuts it, fumble at point gets them a single
high, loopy fulltoss, Dhoni dances down the track, and is beaten by the dip, so is Sanga who had a half-chance at stumping him
full delivery on the stumps, driven down to long-on
gets on the front foot and gets a single to long-off
this one stays low, but he pulls it tow midwicket
drives it towards midwicket, doesn't get far enough of the fielder
gets a single down to long-on
short, across Dhoni, cut away but straight to extra cover

another one out of the ground, he just changed his bat, perhaps went for the heavier one, this is a length ball, right in his zone, he gets under one, and gets massive power into it and goes over long-on
and an even more remarkable shot, short but not much room, Dhoni pushes it through extra cover, the power again imparted through the jab of the bottom arm at the last moment
dances down and works it to the on side for one
it's Sehwag's turn now, short and wide waits for the ball, and delays the cut, and gets it left enough of point
goes for the big drive outside off and misses
ho ho ho, fifty for Dhoni, he gets on to front foot, clears the front leg, and lofts him straight down, what a clean hit
another wide down the leg side, 8 runs from wides now
steps down, plays down the ground for a single
worked away off the pads, gets a single
Dhoni charges down, takes it on the full, and crashes it through the off side and gets two by the time sweeper-cover comes around
short and wide, helped away to point for one
full, almost a yorker, Sehwag doesn't go for a big shot, just eases it to wide of long-off and gets two
full delivery on the pads, played down the ground for one
poor delivery with fine leg up, a half-volley on the pads, luckily for Kula, Sehwag gets it square and gets just two
and gets away with a leg-side delivery again, because it is a slower delivery, and Sehwag fails to make contact
good accurate bouncer, Dhoni sways out, but it reaches Sanga on a half-volley and they get a bye
well bowled, nice yorker, on the stumps, Sehwag can't do much more than dig it out
short ball, jags back in and cramps him up, but he bunts it down for a single

somebody call the doctor please, they are hurting SL bad, Sehwag charges down again, is beaten in the flight and has to take it from away from his body, but he does that does that and goes over the sightscreen. Equals his previous best in ODIs
is yorked by this one
what a cover drive, all along the ground, right enough of extra cover, no mercy here
Sehwag's drive down the ground, gets Dhoni on the back side but gets a single
Dhoni drives down the ground now, but far away from Sehwag. No ill feelings that means
Sehwag makes room, Kandamby floats it wide, Sehwag reaches for it and gets a single to point
starts off with a yorker after drinks break, Sehwag steals a single to point
slower short ball, Dhoni is looking for the cut over cover, but is early into the shot
full delivery, driven to sweeper cover for a single
Sanga has been caught napping, it's a slower ball outside off, Sehwag lets it go and Sanga is slow in getting down and lets away byes
full outside off, Sehwag looks for the cute shot with an open face, but doesn;t make contact
fulltoss, Sehwag opens the face at the last moment, beats point on his right and gets four more. Smart batting, not just power hitting
dropped, hit powerfully to Jaya's left but it goes through him
Shewag has hit it back to Jayasuriya, who looks in some discomfort, having hit in the arm, and Sehwag says something to the effect of: "Who will make these runs now?"
driven to wide of long-on, gets a single
full, fast and wide down the leg side, Sanga does well to make a collection
makes room and gets a single to cover
Sehwag plays straight to point, wants a single but is sent back
and he gets an ordinary one, a low fulltoss even as he charges down and he crashes it straight down the ground, powerful hit
starts off with a slower delivery, gets the outside edge, which flies fine of third man. 300 up in 34.1 overs, what is happening here?
lovely straight hit on the up, almost takes Fernando's head with it, the bowler does well to get his hand in the way, but even the deflection is too fast for mid-off to stop
three fours in a row, misses the yorker, it's a low fulltoss, and Dhoni eases it through the gap between mid-off and extra cover
slower knuckle ball, played to extra cover, some confusion, but both men are back in their creases in time
slower short delivery, Dhoni defends it towards point
short ball, normal pace, tucks him up, he defends it into the on side
good delivery, back of a length, just outside off, and defended towards cover
no-ball, good delivery, a swinging yorker, but he has overstepped
misses out, swinging yorker outside off, Sehwag looks to heave it straight but misses

Sehwag has missed the 150, moves across the stumps, looks to go over the leg side, but turns the bat face too early, gets the back of the bat, and it lobs to point. Many milestones missed, but does he care much for them? Well played Viru. He raises his bat as he walks off
yorker outside off, plays it with an open face and gets off the mark
another yorker, just outside off, played towards cover
played to the left of point, Dhoni comes through for one, Raina is slow to start but reaches home

slower ball does it again, and the batting Powerplay has done it again for the fielding side. This slower delivery seemed fairly obvious from behind, but that;s not the case when you are batting, and Dhoni is drawn into a forward shot and is too late in taking the bottom hand off, the ball lobs to cover, and Sri Lanka now have a chance to save many records from falling
another slower ball, too full, though, and he works it to the on side for one
back of a length, just outside off, Raina defends it towards point
another slower ball, drives it along the ground to cover
almost played on, the slower ball almost gets another batsman. Looks to run it down to third man, but gets a bottom edge onto the pad
full, almost a yorker, and played back to the bowler
good shot, but Raina almost runs himself out. A nice drive is saved well a diving by Kandamby at cover, but Raina doesn't run to begin with, and would have been run out had the throw been on target
tailing into Gambhir's pads, he flicks it to wide of midwicket and takes an easy couple
yorker, Gambhir gets onto the front foot, opens the face and gets a single
good late swing, gets an inside edge, but he pinches a single still
fulltoss on the pads, Gambhir misses out, the fine leg is up, but he goes more square and gets a single to deep backward square
well bowled, full, swinging in, Raina leaves the stumps exposed, and it misses by inches
and is swatted first ball, Gambhir walks down the track, takes the length ball, at gentle pace, and goes over midwicket
low fulltoss outside off, driven to the left of sweeper-cover, gets two
and he comes back with a good delivery, just inches short of being a yorker, outside off, Gambhir looks to get it fine of third man, and edges it through to Sanga and walks
gets a thick outside edge first ball
nice yorker from round the stumps to Raina , who just about manages to get the toe out of the way
slower ball, works it off the pads to square leg for two
big shout first up, but it's the sound of the bat hitting the ground and not the ball
slower bouncer, and Raina ducks into it. Good bowling, another dot ball

why was Tharanga not at the edge of the boundary? Raina miscues a short delivery, not for the first time, but Tharanga ends up running backwards at midwicket boundary. had he been on the fence, this would have been a sitter
full, on the pads, gets a single to midwicket
short ball, into the body, Bhajan can't get it past square leg
full this time, on the stumps, driven down the ground
dropped, Harbhajan flicks it towards midwicket where Samaraweera can't hold on to a sitter. Ragged they are
length ball, on the pads, and he has slogged it over midwicket. Doesn't make perfect contact but does well enough to get it to the boundary despite a diving effort from Mathews
goes for the yorker outside off, Raina can't reach it, and it is close to being a wide, but good job that it's not given. Umpires nowadays are generally too harsh on these deliveries
smart bowling, Raina makes room, and Kula goes wide of off, and a yorker too, Raina can't do much with that
bowls another wide yorker, but crosses the line this time and it is called
short ball, into the body, pulled away along the ground for a single
another nice wide yorker outside off, Harbhajan doesn't help himself by backing away
good yorker, Raina has to dig it out and can't get a single
short ball again, hurries onto Raina, another dot ball
full delivery now, driven down the ground, just a single
good bouncer, Harbhajan backs away too early and Mathews slips in the short delivery for another dot ball
cheeky shot, runs a full delivery down to third man boundary. Harbhajan plays the shot intentionally but it goes too close to Sanga for comfort
another slower bouncer, another dot ball, Harbhajan is way too early into the shot
a bouncer gets Raina again, well directed, into his body, chest high, Raina's weight is forward while pulling, and gets a top edge that goes nowhere but straight up towards the sky
short delivery, worked away off the hips for a single
slwoer ball, Kohli looks to run it down but misses and Sanga fumbles again, on the second bounce admittedly
another short ball, normal pace this time, Harbhajan is late in the pull and hits it one bounce to mid-off
Mathews does well at midwicket, this is a low fulltoss hit well by Harbhajan, and a diving save keeps them down to just one
good shot, orthodox shot for a change, as he flicks it off the pads and gets two towards square leg
another wicket goes, Mathews gets his man, Harbhajan looks to hit a short ball over point and gets the toe end of the bat and it carries straight to third man where Kula takes a safe catch
looks to fend at a short delivery, is beaten
slower short delivery, drops and runs, Mathews fails to collect cleanly, else this would have been a close call for the run-out
length ball, outside off, driven handsomely, to wide of long-off, gets two
slower ball, clearly early into the shot, but since he has played with soft hands the leading edge goes along the ground
drags a low fulltoss from outside off and plays it straight to midwicket
starts with a fulltoss on the pads, which goes for a single to midwicket
powerfully inside-out drive, and as Sunny Gavaskar says on air, Dilshan at extra cover provides it a tunnel to pass under
tries the googly, Kohli goes with the spin, and and goes straight down the ground and beats long-on
yorks himself this time, plays it back to the bowler
another powerful inside-out drive, but Dilshan is alert this time
another fulltoss, and Jadeja takes a single to midwicket
slower short delivery and pulled away to fine leg
quick yorker outside off, Kohli looks to run it down to third man, doesn't make contact
low fulltoss, hit firmly down the ground, gets one to long-off
goes for the big heave, mis-hits, but the idea is right, in that he is looking to go over mid-off, which he manages to do
that's a wide down the leg side, one of the first poor deliveries from Mathews in this spell
Kohli has stolen one here, Jadeja gets an inside edge onto the pads, the ball is on the pitch but Kohli calls him through
length ball, driven down the ground, Kohli takes a single and keeps the strike
works it away off the pads, gets a single, the highest score against SL, beating their own record from Taunton 1999
full, outside off, and driven down the ground for one. The idea is to let Kohli face as much as possible
and the idea is right, Kohli stands tall, takes a short ball, and pulls it wide of long-off. This isn't too far from Kula, but the outfield is too quick
smart batting, can't say the same about the bowling, fine leg is up, he bowls on the pads, Kohli delays the shot a touch and flicks it nicely
pulled down the ground, and hard, Kula at long-on is tested to his left now, does well to keep them down to 2 this time
slower ball, Kohli sees it coming, goes ahead with the shot anyway, gets a single to square leg and keeps strike
starts off with a lovely yorker, Kohli can't do anything with it
bowled him, a touch slower, 127ks, he is looking to hit this length delivery across the line and over midwicket, misses and is gone
doesn't even take guard and swings and misses the first ball he faces
first run of the over, driven down the ground for a single
wide outside off, Jadeja swipes across the line, gets a single
another dot ball, PK looks to make room and is beaten by the angle. Good over for Sri Lanka
low fulltoss, hit back to Jaya and he has hurt his left hand
yorker outside off, called wide, marginal one
half-volley outside off, and Jadeja has lofted it straight down the ground over long-on, very well timed
short, on the pads, and pulled away to midwicket
on the pads, flicked away for one
poor delivery, short, on the pads, fine leg up, but Jadeja can't get it through for four, will get two to square leg
another delivery asking to be hit, and Jadeja obliges this time. Short, pitching in Jaya's half perhaps, and he has played the pick-up pull to send it sailing over midwicket
slower bouncer from Mathews, PK keeps it down and gets a single
full delivery, can't get under it, and gets only a single down to long-on
plays a Dhoni shot, does PK, but doesn't get enough power into it, and gets just a single to long-on
Jadeja is hurting Sri Lanka in the final few overs, low fulltoss, and he has smashed it for four past long-off, clean strike
full outside off, driven past point, and this is India's joint-highest in ODIs

drops  a tough return catch, low fulltoss is drilled back at him, he has to get to his right, fast, gets a hand onto it and PK comes through for the single that takes India to their highest score in ODIs

inn2.comm: swing first ball, starts leg stump, ends up off, played towards point
length ball, outside off, played straight to point
short ball, and Tharanga cashes in, doesn't look to take the skin off the ball, just caresses it through point
fuller, Tharanga gets an inside edge, and takes a single to midwicket
length delivery, Dilshan gets behind the line and punches it back to PK
back of a length, gets beside the line and plays it towards cover
starts off accurately, Tharanga plays it to mid-on and comes through for one
slight shape into Dilshan, back of a length, around off, and defended towards point
nice solid drive through the line, down the ground to mid-off
goes too far across the batsman and pays through a wide
another firm drive on the up, and mid-off comes into play again
back of a length, Dilshan defends towards point
full delivery, shaping into the pads, and he gets a single to fine leg
shot, top shot, just a bit short, just a bit wide, and he creams it past point
back of a length, just outside off, and hit into ground and through to short cover
sees Dilshan charging down, bowls the slower delivery, ill directed though and he works it off his pads
accurate this time, around off, back of a length, defended towards cover
another slower delivery, pitches outside off, cuts away towards middle, defended back to the bowler
slower ball again, 11ks, outside off, and driven to point
short and wide, Dilshan is early into the shot and misses out
back of a length, driven straight to short extra where Tendulkar hopes to find Tharanga short when backing up, the batsman comes in the way of the throw and is hit on the hand
slower ball, short, opens the face and gets a single to third man
that's way down the leg side
length, on the pads, turned away, to short midwicket
drives on the up, and drives handsomely, through the covers, opening the face late to place it well
back of a length, tucks him up, turns away to square leg
short ball, he has punched it away but can't beat cover
misfielded by Sehwag at midwicket, it's a thick inside edge on the pull, Sehwag runs around and dives on the hard ground, he gets a bad bounce and and also hurts his knee
straight delivery, no width, and defended to point
Dilshan walks down the track, PK bowls another slower delivery, they run a single to point and Tharaga would have been gone had Raina hit

lovely slower delivery and Kohli has dropped a sitter. It works out perfectly according to the plan for PK. Short point and a short cover in place, he bowls a slower offcutter that spits at Tharanga and flies towards short point but Kohli is late in reacting
another slower delivery but too full, and he gets a single to mid-off
what a lovely straight hit, length ball, 124ks, and he just eases his arms for the straight hit. Picks the slower ball early and goes through with a lovely, neat followthrough
poor bowling, with fine leg up, he bowls a wide down the leg side
short and wide, and dabs it down to third man for one
back of a length, and drilled towards cover, Ojha has no time to react, just gets his body behind the ball
slower ball again, and Dilshan is way early into the shot
short and pulled away wide of mid-on, easy pickings, good and solid start for SL. Both batsmen have got their eye in, and will now look to attack more
cut away to point where Kohli gets a bad bounce and gives away a single
looks for a big heave over the one side, and is beaten by the slower one. The inside edge saves him
smart batting, slightly he strays on the pads, and Dilshan delays the shot and flicks it past the fine leg in the circle
slower ball again, Dilshan gets beside the line and defends it to mid-off
that's just thumped over mid-on, clears the front leg, clean swing of the arms, and picks up the length ball
goes for his scoop shot, but misses by a long way, and is saved the lbw because he has got the front leg outside the line of off
charges down the track, PK drops it in short and he cuts it straight to point
length ball, a touch slower than normal pace, Dilshan slices it over extra cover
good shot, goooood shot, stands tall, takes it on the up and clears mid-off, as long as Dilshan is going, it's game on
and having pushed the length back, Dilshan now waits for the shorter delivery and pulls it over the leg-side field, smart batting
it's only getting better from Dilshan, goes for his scoop shot, sees it is too full but keeps his mind and sweeps it past fine leg
short, fast, cut away, but straight to point
slower ball, he hits not hard but pinches a single to cover
makes room to the fifth stump and slaps a short ball down to point
goes for the lap shot and doesn't time it well, short fine leg, Ojha, leaps and just cannot get a hand to it
slides in from a length, he moves back and hits it hard, too hard in fact, and the bowler runs across but cannot prevent a single
stands there and thrashes the bat to ball, picking the gap at backward point
fuller ball on middle and leg, clipped to midwicket
good ball, , 110ks, pitches on the stumps and he defends
pitches full and wide, Dilshan flays the bat and gets a thick outer edge down to third man where Tyagi, on the field for Harbhajan, slides and pulls off a good save
on the pads and turned out to the sweeper in the deep
short of a length and he hops back, chopping it down to third man
not much use of the feet from Tharanga but a good-looking push to Nehra at mid-off, without a thought the batsmen set off for a single
what placement! Dilshan gets to his fifty, clearing his front leg and thrashing the ball all along the carpet between cover and mid-off, not a fielder could move
goes wider with the angle and holds back the length too, Dilshan reaches out and tries to flash it but cannot get a hold as the ball is too wide
better delivery, pitches on leg and comes back to Dilshan who has hopped back in his crease, he manages to get over it and pinches a single to cover, well run
slants it back into Dilshan, smartly not offering him any room, but he still gets a single with a nudge toward midwicket to keep the strike rotating
slower ball, 108ks, chopped down to backward point
slides it down the pads, Dilshan shuffles and gets deep fine leg into play with a nice little nudge off his legs
makes room and comes out of the box, PK holds back the length and Tharanga heaves across the line, connecting with the inner half of the bat, and gets a single
loose ball, aimed too far down the pads and that will be a wide
where do you bowl to this guy? PK pitches it up and Dilshan cracks that through extra cover
slants in off a length and he glances it off his hips for one more
and what a shot, stands tall, makes slight room, takes a back-of-a-length delivery and crashes it between mid-off and extra cover
goes for His scoop shot, Zaheer sees it coming, bowls fuller, but the ball is pitched outside leg and he can't be given lbw
is cramped up for room here, but gets a single off the under edge
the inside edge saves Tharanga here, gets his front pad across and is caught in a tangle when playing this length delivery. Zaheer appeals but is also aware of the inside edge
this inside edge will get him runs, charges down, plays away from the body, the edge beats short fine but Ojha chases well and the sliding stop keeps them down to two
smart shot and smart running, runs it off the face of the bat and comes back for two before third man can come around and get it back to the keeper
Dilshan makes room and drives down the ground
angled into the pads, worked away for a single
Ho ho ho, bye bye ball, Dilshan charges down, makes room too, takes this from outside leg and absolutely launches it out of the ground, straight down the ground
even classier this shot, makes room again, goes inside out, over the covers, Dilshan on mission
this time he has flat-batted him for four, this is Jadeja's home town too, charges down and just gets enough bat to beat mid-on, and this outfield is like an airport runway
Jadeja is rattled, fires it wide of leg stump
steps out again, this time he gets the flat delivery on the right line, and Dilshan can only play it back to Jadeja
strays down the leg side, and it kisses the pad on the way, saving Indian an extra delivery
this time no pad can save them a wide, way way down the leg side
a good yorker, Tharanga makes room and Zaheer follows him, cramping him up
fulltoss, knee-high, driven down to mid-off for a single
back of a length, makes room, opens the face and gets a single
length ball, drives it on the up, but can't beat extra cover, was connected properly
drives to mid-off and comes through for a single
starts with a back-of-a-length delivery, which is dabbed away for a single
slower ball, Dilshan stays beside the line and pushes it to cover
walks down the wicket, Nehra bowls a slower one, he thumps it back and Nehra gets a hand onto it and saves two
one slower ball too many, and Dilshan walks down the track again and pulls it, nay murders it, to midwicket
slightly fuller, slightly wider, Dilshan taps it towards point and gets a single
full ball on the pads, and worked away to square leg
flat, into the pads, and he works it away for a single
shot, lovely shot, easily done that too, this was flat, but barely outside off, he leans back and forces it through the covers, there is a sweeper there, but he can't do anything about it
opens the face too early and is beaten outside off
driving length, Dilshan drives but can't beat cover
this time he gets the drive down to long-off
wants a single to short fine but the ball has gone straight to the fielder
starts with a regulation offbreak, Dilshan gets across and turns it to midwicket for one
good loop here, slow at 81ks, some turn from round the stumps, Tharanga defends
fires this one in at 97ks, the cut can't beat short third man
slower, but straighter and is worked away off the pads
he has flighted it nicely so far, Dishan gets onto the front foot and defends it outside off
looks for the toppie, 94ks, Dilshan gets in front of stumps and turns it to midwicket
dances down the track and smashes it to long-off
full ball, driven straight to extra cover
another full ball, driven straight to extra cover
and again, driven straight to Raina at extra cover, the crowd getting involved too
low, fast, full, and driven down the ground for one
doesn't finish it off nicely, bowls a wide down the leg side
full ball into the pads, driven down to long-on for one
fullish delivery on the pads, turned away for a single
doosra, slower in the air too, Dilshan in late in reading it but he drops it to the right of point and comes through for one
dances down the track, is beaten by the dip but makes the adjustment and drives it down to long-on
flatter delivery, and cut straight to point
tosses this one up nicely, and Dilshan drives it to long-on
fast, flat and short, 101ks, Tharanga cuts but can't beat backward point again
well placed, wide of long-on, and comes back for two that takes him to 98
flat on off, and pushed away to long-off for one
wide, way down the leg side, 150 comes up
tossed up, driven down the ground for another single
there it is, worked off the pads, gets to a special hundred, his third this year, hasn't witled under the pressure of a huge chase and has brought up the hundred in 73 balls
Tharanga breaks the shackles, lofts him to the right of long-on, not the cleanest of shots but effective
yorker there, can't do much with it this time
flat offbreak, Dilshan gets across and turns it around the corner for one
worked away off the pads
overspinner, Dilshan stays beside the line and opens the face to get a single
flighted nicely, Tharanga dives, Raina dives at extra cover and saves a single
another overspinner, Tharanga doesn't get any room and defends
this is fired into his pads, he works it away to bring up his 50, an ideal foil to Dilshan's fireworks
lovely shot, clean, straight, high, makes room for himself, gets under the delivery and goes for the sightscreen
he follows the batsman this time, but the batsmen helps it into the leg side for a single
Dilshan charges down, makes room, goes inside out but can't beat extra cover
comes down the track, and drives down to long-off
driven inside out, and Gambhir gets a bad bounce at extra cover
enough of hitting straight to extra cover and not finding the gap, this time Dilshan goes the distance and lofts it over Raina, clean connection again
charges down again, and hits him two-bounce to long-off
well bowled and well played, Dilshan charges down again, Bhajan bowls the overspinner, he manages to get it wide of long-off and takes two
doosra, sharp one too, and Dilshan defends it back to the bowler
low fulltoss, hit back to Harbhajan
flighted well again, Dilshan drives it down the ground
flights it again, Tharanga yorks himself, another dot ball
drift, drift, Dilshan saw a juicy half-volley, looked to hit the leather off the ball, but it kept getting away from him and beat him
low fulltoss and hit down powerfully down the ground
yorks himself around the leg stump
almost a run-out, wide of extra cover, comes back for two, Jadeja surprises them with the throw but it lands on a half-volley
another lovely clean strike, dances down the track and lofts him over long-on

Raina strikes, good stumping. Tharanga comes down the track again, Raina fires it in, the ball deflects off Tharanga's pads, goes one bounce and way down the leg side to Dhoni, but Tharanga is way out himself
overspinner, flighted outside off, he goes for the cut and is beaten
another topspinner, he drops and runs
Sanga gets off the mark by working this one into the leg side
yorker, Dilshan digs it out, but it's another dot ball
another yorker, but this one strays on the pads and he gets an easy single
strays on the pads, and he turns it around the corner for one
full delivery, driven down the ground for one
short and wide, cuts it away
nicely flicked away off the pads, gets a single
Gambhir has dropped Dilshan at extra cover. It would have been an excellent catch had he held on to it, always going away from him, he leaps at the right time but just can't hold onto it
Sanga has hit his stride now, another clean strike, he gets under this one and slog-sweeps it over midwicket, but there is certain finesse to the shot too
length ball, flat, he works it around for one again
driven on the up, but can't beat cover
comes down the track, Zaheer shortens the length, doesn't give him any room, another dot
another drive on the up, gets a single down to long-off
good delivery, tucks him up with a short one into the ribs, but Dilshan gets a single into the cover
another return catch goes unclaimed, flat-batted back to the right of Zaheer, who just manages to get a finger onto it. It's hit so powerfully it still goes for four
stops on him a touch, but he gets a single down to long-off
good shot, good shoooot, again clears his front leg, and sweeps it straight over the bowler's head and the sightscreen
consequently Raina fires one down the leg side
into the pads again, and he pushes it for one
full and flat to Dilshan, who drives it inside-out and gets a single
steps out, almost yorks himself, gets a single down to long-on
almost a catch, charges down, is beaten in the flight, doesn't time it well, and it falls one bounce to Tendulkar at long-on
and another six in this over, Sanga seems to be continuing from the T20s, clears the front leg again and lofts him over midwicket
short, cut away, metres to the left of sweeper-cover, Harbhajan, and they come back for two
tries the bouncer, doesn't get nearly as high as he wants, and Dilshan takes full toll, pulling it between fine leg and square leg
swipes at this one, from outside off, to long-on
what a scoop, what an amazing shot, unbelievable, he gets on a knee, Zaheer knows what is coming, drops it in short, Dilshan goes ahead with the shot, and it carries all the way for six
rare play and miss, stays beside the line and looks to go off side, over ambitious here
fulltoss, he delays the shot to go for the point boundary but is late into the shot and misses
fires this one into the pads and the batsman gets an easy single to long-on
well bowled, well played, charges down, Bhajan slows the ball down, dropping it short, Dilshan holds the charge and pushes it to cover and runs
that's absolutely hammered away, chrages out, makes it into a low fulltoss, goes straight, and good news is, all three - non-striker, umpire, bowler - are safe. First boundary off Bhajan
goes for the big sweep, misses, but gets a leg-bye
flat and full, driven down the ground
short, and Sanga is in too good a nick to miss these offerings, clobbers it away to the midwicket boundary for four
goes for the scoop, misses, Dhoni and Zaheer appeal for the caught-behind, crowd provides the chorus, but there is nothing in it
he has driven it with open face from outside off, Tyagi, substituting at third man, does well to keep them to two
lucky, but he has made his own luck, fulltoss, he gives it his all, gets a thick edge, which speeds past Dhoni, and takes him to his personal best score
yorked, but gets a single to long-off
low fulltoss, driven to the right of sweeper-cover and they come back for two
yorker, played to midwicket this time, a little too powerfully to come through for one
offbreak, spinning into the hips, Dilshan makes room and dabs it for one
this is well bowled actually, flighted, dipping, and Sanga has absolutely slogged it, no pretence whatsoever, to midwicket
full delivery, and driven down the ground for one
another overspinner, and cut away to point for one

and he has launched this into another shamiana, brings up his 50th ODI 50, the second-fastest for Sri Lanka. He charges down the track again, takes a length delivery and lofts it over long-off. Making it look easy here
on the pads, and worked away for one to square leg
starts off with a nice slower offcutter, it loops off Sanga's bat one-bounce to point
short, quick, Sanga looks to go over midwicket, is late in the shot, and gets an underside edge, but safe
slower ball, and he has swatted it like a fly, down the ground, to the right of long-on

another drop, at this rate they'll need Laxman, Dravid and Ganguly as super subs, this time Harbhajan has dropped a sitter at midwicket, pulled away straight to him, he leaps for no reason and is unbalanced aand drops a chest-high catch
runs this one down for a single to third man
yorker, Dilshan gets enough bat on it to get a single to third man
yorks Dilshan down the leg side, well bowled
Dilshan charges down, makes it into a low fulltoss and it's hit back to Bhajan
comes down the track again, and flicks it to wide of long-on
clears the front leg, and drives it down the ground
shimmies down again and gets a single to long-off

no midwicket in the circle, and he picks the gap perfectly, takes a low fulltoss and bisects the wide long-on and deep square leg. he couldn't have done it better with a compass and protractor or whatever they use in school
slower ball, Dilshan makes room and hits it straight to extra cover
fulltoss, smashed towards extra cover, Harbhajan makes a diving save, but gets a bad bounce that hurts the middle finger on his bowling hand
lovely shot, down on a knee, inside out, and over cover, but finds sweeper-cover
slower ball, just back of a length, smashed down the ground
another slower delivery, short too, and pulled for a single to square leg
he has scooped it into his face, good job that he is wearing the helmet, he goes for the shot, PK bowls the low fulltoss, he contacts but can't get his head out of the way
starts off with a leg-side fulltoss with fine leg up, PK, the fielder, does well to deflect it towards square leg
superb batting, sees a length ball, gets the front leg out of the way, and goes over mid-on, not too much power into it but just enough

one more for the shamianas, he is stepping out, sees a shorter delivery from Zaheer, and pulls it monstrously over wide long-on. It's unlikely he would have got tired, but every now and then Sanga hits one onto the shamianas and earns himself a breather
whoa, 96th boundary of the day, low fulltoss, makes room and goes over extra cover, clean clean hitting
make it 97, gets an off-stump half-volley, makes room and crashes it through the covers, moves onto 86 off 39
fulltoss on leg stump, and he misses out, but gets a leg-bye and stays on strike
slower bouncer, and Sanga is waiting for it, and pulls it over midwicket. He is making it look ridiculously easy
another short ball, and pulled away to midwicket

PK creates a third opportunity and finally someone holds onto it. Another slower bouncer, Sanga gets a top edge on the pull and Jadeja holds on to a simple catch at deep square leg. PK exults, it's been a tough day full of misfortune for him. But Sanga, take a bow, what an innings
another slower ball, on the pads, and played away to fine leg for a single
and he is pulling emphatically right away, gets two to midwicket, and then a wide throw from Jadeja results in an overthrow

Dilshan reaches 150 in style, plays the pick-up shot off his hips, and it goes sailing over midwicket, what an innings so far. And for the second time in the day, the elusive double hundred seems attainable
Jayasuriya looks to sweep, extra bounce here, and beats Jayasuriya
full and flat delivery on the pads, and Jayasuriya flicks it away to wide of midwicket and comes back for two

and Jaya goes, charges down too early, Harbhajan bowls flatter, shorter, and it's a normal offbreak. He is clearly beaten in the flight, looks to fend but can't cover the line and the ball sneaks through bat and pad, and Dhoni finishes the stumping efficiently
gets onto the front foot and works the ball into the on side
another ball turning into the pads, and turned away for a single
good overspinner, MJ looks to turn it on the on side, but has to just defend back to the bowler
Starts off with a fulltoss, he hits it one bounce to deep midwicket
Fired down the leg side, MJ misses the sweep, but it's an extra run
Another one fired down the legs, and he doesn't make an attempt to play it
another one down the leg side, it kisses the pad and saves him a wide
that's a nice gift, another fulltoss on the pads, this time he hits it wide of midwicket and gets the 100th boundary of the match
Jadeja and MJ collide, but MJ breaks free and goes through for the single. Would have been interesting had Dhoni collected this cleanly and caught him short of his ground
big shout for lbw, MJ sweeps and misses, but it's pitched outside leg

he has bowled him, he roars in delight, another double hundred missed, but Harbhajan has brought India right back in. He has just started his last over, Dilshan charges out, is beaten by the dip, the ball pitches on a length outside off, turns in enough to hit the stumps. Game on here
and what a shot first up, and he whips it from outside off to wide of mid-on
works this one off the pads for single
flighted outside off, MJ gets on the front foot and defends
gets across the stumps, and works it around his pads for a single
full delivery on the pads, flicked away straight to midwicket. End of Harbhajan, 2 for 58, good bowling
continues to bowl full and wide outside leg stump
full, fast, misses on the sweep

MJ has committed suicide here, MJ works it towards square leg with soft hands and makes up his mind he is coming back for two. Kohli hares around from deep midwicket and surprises everybody with his speed. Even though the throw is two bounces to Dhoni, even a dive can't save MJ
dot ball, full, outside off, defended
steps out, makes it into a low fulltoss and gets a single to long-on
Full on the pads, played straight to Raina at midwicket, who returns it fast and low to non-striker's end
another ball clipped away off the pads and he gets a single this time
stays back and works this one off the pads towards deep square leg
Nehra is on target, around off, Mathews drops and runs and gets a single
350 up with this boundary, it's short, Kandamby goes back and pulls it wide of midwicket. Nothing fancy but nicely placed
another short-arm pull, but this time he can't beat midwicket
makes room, and plays a fullish delivery to cover for one
length ball, drilled down the ground, gets a single to long-off
full, on the pads, driven down the ground for one
stays full, and on the pads, gets a single to fine leg
another full, flat delivery on the pads, and turned away to fine leg for one
looks for a slog sweep, but this is another yorker-length delivery and he gets just a single to long-on
makes room, goes inside out but can't get under it and gets just a single
another misfield, low full toss, slow swept one bounce to midwicket, but Raina doesn't get his body behind it, and it bounces through his hands
yorker, swinging too, gets just a single to long-on, Tendulkar ran in fast to keep them to one
lovely yorker again, swinging in towards Kandamby, who digs it out and comes through for one
another misfield, bowls back of a length, surprised Mathews, but doesn't get down early enough to field it in its followthrough
shimmies down, and drives him through the covers
no-ball, and it's a free-hit coming up, bowled well but oversteps, a single results to third man off a thick edge
almost a yorker, Kandamby can't get under it, lobs it to Raina at midwicket, and even this one is dropped. Not that it would have mattered
the leading edge goes for four, Mathews gives it an almighty whack over leg, but is early into the shot, but the edge flies over point and square of third man
slower bouncer, and Kandamby, who often reminds me of Ranatunga, gets around and pulls it to fine leg
length ball driven down the ground for a single
nice yorker, Kandamby digs it out and runs, Raina from midwicket comes in fast, goes for the underarm flick even as he is diving, but doesn't hit the stumps. Would have got his man had he hit
how big a shot is this? big risk by walking across, Zaheer bowls a low fulltoss, makes enough contact to just clear short fine leg
another fulltoss, driven down the ground for one
he has nearly bowled him with that yorker, but Kandamby makes room and gets his bat down just in time
full ball outside off, driven straight to point
low fulltoss, driven down the ground, gets one
another yorker to Kandamby, he misses this one but it is going down the leg side
low fulltoss, driven through the covers, gets another single
and Kandamby gets a late-swinging yorker again, and again he is saved because it is going down, top over so far
and he almost gets another flick boundary to fine leg, this time Nehra goes outside off, thereby making him work harder to beat short fine, where Zaheer keeps them down to one
has he edged it outside off? Doesn't matter because it hasn't carried to Dhoni, but that it is a dot ball does matter
overpitched, makes room, drives well, to wide of sweeper-cover, comes through for two
looks to go over fine leg again, but Zaheer digs this one in short, and Mathews pulls off the front foot and gets a single to square leg
doesn't carry to Harbhajan at extra cover, but the misfield gives away a single. It lands on a half-volley in front of Bhajan and the fumble costs them a single
driven powerfully, straight to extra cover, single results, 22 off 19 now
another late-swinging yorker, Kandamby can't do anything with this one, ends up playing it back to the bowler
another low fulltoss outside off, can't get under it, just a single to long-off
the yorker goes slightly wrong, low fulltoss on the pads, and he gets a single to deep midwicket, brings up the 50 of the partnership
goes for a big heave over mid-off, gets a thick edge, over point and gets two to square of third man

this is close, big big decision at this time of the day, Mathews is going for the flick over fine leg, misses, is hit in front of the stumps, umpire reckons it would have missed off, and Hawkeye says it would have kissed the outside of it

drama here, Nehra bowls a good yorker, Kandamby wants a single but it's gone straight to Nehra. He has Kandamby dead outside the crease, goes for an underarm throw that hits Kandamby and they run an overthrow. No wonder Kandamby reminds me of Ranatunga, and I don't mean in a negative way at all
yorker again, outside off, played to extra cover for one
one of the few length balls from these left-armers in these final few overs, Mathews gets under it, and drives to sweeper-cover

have they got a run-out here? superb collection on a half-volley from Zaheer and Kandamby is gone. It is a short ball, pulled to Tendulkar at midwicket, he is already on the back foot and comes through for one. The lands in front of the stumps but on a half-volley, Zaheer collects cleanly and disturbs the stumps, with Kandamby running casually - not diving, not sliding the bat. Did somebody say Ranatunga?
yorker across Mathews, he misses, and the crowd goes berserk. It may as well have been a wicket
good shot, driven square of the wicket, beats point, goes square of third man, gets two
yorker again, he will gets just a single to extra cover

and he finishes with another yorker and another run-out and what's more, the new batsman will be on strike. Samaraweere manages to dig out the yorker, but it's hit straight to Raina at extra cover, Zaheer is back to collect the throw, which is on the top of the stumps, and another wicket goes down
Kulasekara does his job, gets a single off a length ball to cover and brings Mathews on strike
another yorker, driven wide of long-off, Kohli does well to get there quick, but then gets a bad bounce, which results in a fumble, which results in two

another yorker, another good piece of running, Kula just scampers back to the danger end, and it has gone straight to long-on, who goes for the keeper's end, but Mathews is running between the the throw and the keeper

and Tendulkar has held onto the most important catch of the match. The first hittable delivery of the over, a low fulltoss, Mathews gets under it, but doesn't get enough elevation and Tendulkar holds on to a simple catch at midwicket. Crowd goes wild, SL dressing room is stunned
thick edge to a yorker outside off, and the third man is straight, smart thinking from Dhoni
and Nehra holds his nerves. Bowls another low fulltoss outside off, he can't get under it, and gets just a single to long-off
